summary: A documentary following German auteur Werner Herzog as he deals with difficult actors, bad weather and getting a boat over a mountain, all in an effort to make his film Fitzcarraldo (1982).
cast: Werner Herzog|Klaus Kinski|Claudia Cardinale|Jason Robards|Mick Jagger|Alfredo De Rio Tambo|Ángela Reina|Carmen Correa|Elia De Rio Ene|David Pérez Espinosa|Miguel Ángel Fuentes|Mariano Gagnon|Paul Hittscher|Huerequeque Enrique Bohorquez|Evaristo Nunkuag Ikanan|José Lewgoy|Laplace Martins|Thomas Mauch|Nelson De Rio Cenepa|Walter Saxer|Jorge Vignati|Candace Laughlin|Beat Presser
title: Burden of Dreams
